title.value: Изучение гетерозиса по признаку 'масса 1000 семян' у гибридов люпина узколистного
Study of heterosis by the character of 'thousand-seed weight' in blue lupine hybrids

journal.title: Arable Farming and Breeding in Belarus : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Kozlovskij, A.A., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: The literature data on possible ways of heterosis effect prolonging in plants out of the bounds of the first seed hybrid generation are summarized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus. There were also presented the results on the study of heterosis by the character of 'thousand-seed weight' in F1 and F2 blue lupine (Lupinus angustifolius) hybrids. It was shown that by the studied character (in the great majority of hybrids) there is a positive heterosis both in F1 (17 out of 20) and F2 (15 out of 20). Nonallelic recessive and dominant genes were the genetic factors that determine heterosis effect by thousand-seed weight. It is assumed that tetraploidy of blue lupine favoures prolongation of heterosis effect out of the boundaries of F1.
